channel.title: Alexandru Totolici on UCOSP
channel.description: Recent content in Alexandru Totolici on UCOSP

item.title: Alexandru Totolici
item.description: Hi, I’m Alexandru Totolici. I hail from UBC, starting the 6th winter term of my Bachelor of Science program (majoring in Computer Science). I’ll be working on Mercurial. I’ve been fortunate enough to work with some great people during co-ops at WebCT (now Blackboard), MDA, Safe Software, and Kodak, as well as during my time with UBC’s Office of Learning Technology. I’ve touched on QA, GUI, server API testing, backend tool development, WordPress and MediaWiki plugin development, and I’ve done it in everything from Bash to C#.
